stateDiagram

classDef active fill:yellow,stroke-width:2px;

state "$initial_state" as ROOT.(InitialState)

state NotShooting {

        state "$initial_state" as NotShooting.(InitialState)

        Idle

        Idle : Idle

        state Configuring {

                state "$initial_state" as Configuring.(InitialState)

                NewValueSelection

                NewValueSelection : NewValueSelection

                state NewValuePreview {

                        state "$initial_state" as NewValuePreview.(InitialState)

                        State1

                        State1 : State1

                        State2

                        State2 : State2

                }

        }

}

ROOT.(InitialState) --> NotShooting

NotShooting.(InitialState) --> Idle

Idle --> Configuring : EvConfig

Configuring --> Idle : EvConfig

Configuring.(InitialState) --> NewValueSelection

NewValueSelection --> NewValuePreview : EvNewValue

NewValuePreview --> NewValueSelection : EvNewValueRejected

NewValuePreview --> NewValueSelection : EvNewValueSaved

NewValuePreview.(InitialState) --> State1

State1 --> State2 : Ev2
Events
settings
